caseTitle: Rana Aamer Raza Ashfaq & others v. Dr. Minhaj Ahmad Khan & another
tagline: The Governor while acting as Chancellor is a statutory functionary in terms of section 11(1) of the Bahauddin Zakariya University Act and, in the performance of his functions under the Act, he is to act and is bound by the advice tendered by the Chief Minister in the manner provided in section 11(8) of the Act read with Article 105 of the Constitution and the timeline given in proviso to Article 105 of the Constitution which stands incorporated in the Act by legislative reference.
